SCDC example data

Meichen

05 February, 2020

Source: vignettes/web/SCDC_data.Rmd
SCDC_data.Rmd

For more detailed data description and analysis, please refer to the SCDC manuscript.

Pancreatic islets datasets:

  • scRNA-seq data from Segerstolpe et al. (2016)

  • scRNA-seq data from Baron et al. (2017)

  • scRNA-seq data from Segerstolpe et al. (2016) after clustering QC
  • scRNA-seq data from Baron et al. (2017) after clustering QC

  • scRNA-seq data from Xin et al. (2016) after clustering QC

  • bulk RNA-seq data from Fadista et al. (2014)

Three Cell-line Mixture:

  • scRNA-seq data
  • bulk RNA-seq data

Mouse mammary gland datasets:

  • scRNA-seq from Perou Lab after clustering QC
  • scRNA-seq from Tabula Muris (2018) after clustering QC
  • bulk RNA-seq data from Perou Lab – 10X
  • bulk RNA-seq data from Perou Lab – Fresh-frozen

Raw and processed three-cell-line mixture data and mouse mammary gland data are available at GEO database: .

Developed by Meichen Dong.

Site built with pkgdown 1.4.1.
